entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High 21 except 17 near Lake Ontario.

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with showers changing to 30 percent chance of showers after midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening and after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 late this evening then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
